Articles.Content: This is a video I just did within an hour in After Effects CS5. I can do more, as long as there are textures for the other planets and moons.

I'm liking it, great job on doing this.

I can't wait until you do the whole solar system in this way and see how small they really are compared to each other.
Wow I never really realized how small Minmus was compared to the Mun! This looks great, you should definitely add the other celestial bodies with the sun being last.
I thought Kerbin was about 1200km in diameter...

RogueMason, it is. I presume he is showing their radii as opposed to their diameter.

As for the video, it seems great! Definitely looking forward to the possible Solar System video.
I just need textures. But the wiki only provide textures for minmus mun and kerbin
